item.description:
Due to the repainting and the recarpeting of the regular room, we may be ousted from MIT for the evening.

 

I propose we begin the festivities at Cosi, a mere 100 yards away from our regular space.  There are some tables in the back area with comfy chairs that if available will be a good place to gather.  I will try to get there early so as to work on securing at least part of that area.

We can check in on the main spot and start to migrate over if it seems doable during the evening.   I do encourage at least one person per table however to buy food/drink so that Cosi doesn't look upon in a bad light.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the loud people with games on the tables.
item.name: Gaming where it is warm and Cosi.
